_source.text: After a year with Anaheim, he's now on pace for a better than point-a-game year ... After signing with the Ducks as a free agent in 2003, he was reacquired by the Lightning for a second-round draft pick in the summer of 2004 ...

text: After a year with Anaheim, he's now on **pace** for a **better** **than** point-a-game year ... After signing
with the Ducks as a free agent in 2003, he was reacquired by the **Lightning** for a second-round draft pick in the summer of 2004 ...
